Base Elements

Buttons

<h1 id="buttons">Buttons</h1>

Checkbox with label

Checkbox accessible styling depends on the current HTML structure. To use this element without a label just remove the word from inside the <span class="checkbox__label"></span>.

<label class="checkbox">
	  <input class="checkbox__input" type="checkbox" value="None" name="check" id="checkbox">
	  <span class="checkbox__label"></span>
	</label>
	

<h1 id="checkbox-with-label">Checkbox with label</h1>
	<p>Checkbox accessible styling depends on the current HTML structure. To use this element without a label just remove the word from inside the <code>&lt;span class=&quot;checkbox__label&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</code>.</p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;label class=&quot;checkbox&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;input class=&quot;checkbox__input&quot; type=&quot;checkbox&quot; value=&quot;None&quot; name=&quot;check&quot; id=&quot;checkbox&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;span class=&quot;checkbox__label&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
	&lt;/label&gt;
	</code></pre>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0081/0000/7905/c000ee14-c445-11e5-9639-6fcd706c7ccd.gif" alt="checkbox"></p>

File

<h1 id="file">File</h1>

Footer

This footer can be used as a blank footer element to create any specific footer you need. An example of a custom footer can be seen in form-footer.

<h1 id="footer">Footer</h1>
	<p>This footer can be used as a blank footer element to create any specific footer you need. An example of a custom footer can be seen in form-footer.</p>
	<p><img src="https://github.ibm.com/Bluemix/bluemix-components/blob/master/images/footer-example.png" alt="footer"></p>

Lists

<h1 id="lists">Lists</h1>

Radio Button

Radio button accessible styling depends on the current HTML structure. To use this element without a label just remove the word from inside the <span class="radio__label"></span>.

<label class="radio">
	  <input class="radio__input" type="radio" value="None" name="radio" id="radio">
	  <span class="radio__label"></span>
	</label>
	

<h1 id="radio-button">Radio Button</h1>
	<p>Radio button accessible styling depends on the current HTML structure. To use this element without a label just remove the word from inside the <code>&lt;span class=&quot;radio__label&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</code>.</p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;label class=&quot;radio&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;input class=&quot;radio__input&quot; type=&quot;radio&quot; value=&quot;None&quot; name=&quot;radio&quot; id=&quot;radio&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;span class=&quot;radio__label&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
	&lt;/label&gt;
	</code></pre>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0081/0000/7985/3d3ed40a-c4e5-11e5-92c0-60b7b34186c3.gif" alt="radio"></p>

Select

<h1 id="select">Select</h1>

Table

Dependencies

// Path to bower_components
	// (edit according to your file structure)
	$path: 'bower_components/bluemix-components';
	
	// Global
	@import '#{path}/global/colors/colors';
	@import '#{path}/global/fonts/font-face';
	@import '#{path}/global/typography/typography';
	
	// Base Elements
	@import '#{path}/base-elements/tables/tables';

Configurations

Attributes

data-sortable="true": use to modify <th> elements as a javascript hook for sorting columns of data.

<tr class="table__row">
	  <th class="table__column-title" data-sortable="true">Header Title</th>
	  <th class="table__column-title">Header Title</th>
	</tr>

.table .cta: makes a <th> or <td> element to become a container for a call-to-action (i.e. checkbox, status icon, etc).

.table__main-title: use to add a top-level title to your table.

<tr class="table__row">
	  <th class="table__main-title">
	    <strong>Table Title</strong>
	    <a href="#" class="link">Link</a>
	  </th>
	</tr>
	
<h1 id="table">Table</h1>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/7451/3399073a-c07c-11e5-9345-35b0abd5184a.png" alt="table"></p>
	<h2 id="dependencies">Dependencies</h2>
	<pre><code class="lang-scss">// Path to bower_components
	// (edit according to your file structure)
	$path: &#39;bower_components/bluemix-components&#39;;
	
	// Global
	@import &#39;#{path}/global/colors/colors&#39;;
	@import &#39;#{path}/global/fonts/font-face&#39;;
	@import &#39;#{path}/global/typography/typography&#39;;
	
	// Base Elements
	@import &#39;#{path}/base-elements/tables/tables&#39;;
	</code></pre>
	<h2 id="configurations">Configurations</h2>
	<h3 id="attributes">Attributes</h3>
	<p><code>data-sortable=&quot;true&quot;</code>: use to modify <code>&lt;th&gt;</code> elements as a javascript hook for sorting columns of data.</p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;tr class=&quot;table__row&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;th class=&quot;table__column-title&quot; data-sortable=&quot;true&quot;&gt;Header Title&lt;/th&gt;
	  &lt;th class=&quot;table__column-title&quot;&gt;Header Title&lt;/th&gt;
	&lt;/tr&gt;
	</code></pre>
	<p><code>.table .cta</code>: makes a <code>&lt;th&gt;</code> or <code>&lt;td&gt;</code> element to become a container for a call-to-action (i.e. checkbox, status icon, etc).</p>
	<p><code>.table__main-title</code>: use to add a top-level title to your table.</p>
	<p><img src="https://uploads.github.ibm.com/github-enterprise-assets/0000/0076/0000/7475/c4f02540-c0ec-11e5-9c20-cd38d715d403.png" alt="table main-title"></p>
	<pre><code class="lang-html">&lt;tr class=&quot;table__row&quot;&gt;
	  &lt;th class=&quot;table__main-title&quot;&gt;
	    &lt;strong&gt;Table Title&lt;/strong&gt;
	    &lt;a href=&quot;#&quot; class=&quot;link&quot;&gt;Link&lt;/a&gt;
	  &lt;/th&gt;
	&lt;/tr&gt;
	</code></pre>
